Interface EMGroupChangeListener


  • public interface EMGroupChangeListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAdminAdded(java.lang.String groupId, java.lang.String administrator)
      Callback when a member has been changed to admin
      void onAdminRemoved(java.lang.String groupId, java.lang.String administrator)
      Callback when member is removed from admin
      void onAnnouncementChanged(java.lang.String groupId, java.lang.String announcement)
      callback when the announcement changed
      void onAutoAcceptInvitationFromGroup(java.lang.String groupId, java.lang.String inviter, java.lang.String inviteMessage)
      When received group join invitation, will auto accept it and join the group Please refer to EMOptions.setAutoAcceptGroupInvitation(boolean value)
      void onGroupDestroyed(java.lang.String groupId, java.lang.String groupName)
      group dissolution SDK will delete the group from local DB and local cache, then notify user that the group is destroyed

      when receiving a group invitation
      void onMemberExited(java.lang.String groupId, java.lang.String member)
      Callback when a member exited the group
      void onMemberJoined(java.lang.String groupId, java.lang.String member)
      Callback when a member join the group.
      void onMuteListAdded(java.lang.String groupId, java.util.List<java.lang.String> mutes, long muteExpire)
      Callback when group member(s) is muted (added to mute list), and is not allowed to post message temporarily based on muted time duration
      void onMuteListRemoved(java.lang.String groupId, java.util.List<java.lang.String> mutes)
      Callback when group member(s) is unmuted (removed from mute list), and allow to post message now
      void onOwnerChanged(java.lang.String groupId, java.lang.String newOwner, java.lang.String oldOwner)
      Callback when chat room ownership has been transferred
      void onRequestToJoinAccepted(java.lang.String groupId, java.lang.String groupName, java.lang.String accepter)
      when the group invitation is accepted
      void onRequestToJoinDeclined(java.lang.String groupId, java.lang.String groupName, java.lang.String decliner, java.lang.String reason)
      when the group invitation is declined

      void onSharedFileDeleted(java.lang.String groupId, java.lang.String fileId)

        Parameters:
        groupId - group id
        groupName - group's subject
        inviter - Who invite you join the group
        reason - Literal message coming with the invitation

        Parameters:
        groupId - group id
        groupName - group's name
        applicant - The applicant want to join the group
        reason - Literal message coming with the application

      • onMuteListAdded

        void onMuteListAdded(java.lang.String groupId,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> mutes,
                     long muteExpire)
        Callback when group member(s) is muted (added to mute list), and is not allowed to post message temporarily based on muted time duration
        Parameters:
        groupId - group id
        mutes - member(s) added to mute list Map.entry.key is muted username. Map.entry.value is the duration of muted time, in milliseconds

      • onMuteListRemoved

        void onMuteListRemoved(java.lang.String groupId,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> mutes)
        Callback when group member(s) is unmuted (removed from mute list), and allow to post message now
        Parameters:
        groupId - group id
        mutes - members that be removed from mute list

      • onAdminAdded

        void onAdminAdded(java.lang.String groupId,
                  java.lang.String administrator)
        Callback when a member has been changed to admin
        Parameters:
        groupId - group id
        administrator - member who has been changed to admin

      • onAdminRemoved

        void onAdminRemoved(java.lang.String groupId,
                    java.lang.String administrator)
        Callback when member is removed from admin
        Parameters:
        groupId - group id
        administrator - the member whose admin permission is removed

        oldOwner - previous owner
